keyMoments.title: Rescues Chimney from Falling
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his stretching powers to catch Chimney and Gonbe as they are thrown off the Rocketman due to its rapid acceleration.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's quick reflexes and protective nature, even toward children who stowed away on the rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Forms Three-Way Alliance
keyMoments.description: Luffy proposes and successfully establishes an alliance between the Straw Hat Pirates, Franky Family, and Galley-La Company to rescue Robin and Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's leadership and ability to unite former enemies under a common cause. This alliance is crucial for the upcoming Enies Lobby battle.
keyMoments.quote: For now, we fight as one. Together, we'll achieve our goal!

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Franky After Four Years
keyMoments.description: In a flashback, Iceburg is shocked to learn that Cutty Flam (Franky) is alive and has returned to Water 7 four years after supposedly dying.
keyMoments.significance: This flashback reveals the backstory of how Franky survived and maintained contact with Iceburg over the years.
keyMoments.quote: Cutty Flam? That's impossible... I thought he was dead!

keyMoments.title: Argues with Franky About Tom's Legacy
keyMoments.description: Iceburg and Franky have a heated argument about how each has chosen to honor Tom's memory, with Iceburg revealing he's never forgiven Franky for the weapons that led to Tom's execution.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the deep emotional wounds and complex relationship between the two apprentices of Tom.
keyMoments.quote: Don't forget who made the weapons that caused all this! I've never forgiven you, even if Tom did!

keyMoments.title: Entrusts Pluton Blueprints to Franky
keyMoments.description: Iceburg gives the ancient weapon Pluton blueprints to Franky and tells him to leave Water 7 and stop using his real name to avoid the World Government. He breaks down in tears, revealing his relief that Franky survived.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation explaining why CP9 targeted Franky and why Iceburg has been protecting this secret. Shows the deep bond between them despite their argument.
keyMoments.quote: I'm just... I'm just glad you're alive.

reveals.information: Entrusted the Pluton blueprints to Franky four years ago
Has never forgiven Franky for creating the weapons that led to Tom's execution, despite Tom forgiving him

keyMoments.title: Reveals Cyborg Transformation
keyMoments.description: In flashback, Franky shows Iceburg his new cyborg body and explains how the Sea Train destroyed his original body, forcing him to rebuild himself with spare ship parts.
keyMoments.significance: Explains how Franky became a cyborg and survived his attempt to stop the Sea Train from taking Tom away.
keyMoments.quote: The Sea Train wrecked my body, so I had to make myself a new one!

keyMoments.title: Confronts Iceburg About World Government
keyMoments.description: Franky angrily questions why Iceburg would build ships for the World Government after they executed Tom.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's lingering anger at the World Government and his different approach to honoring Tom's memory compared to Iceburg.
keyMoments.quote: How can you build ships for the World Government after what they did to Tom?!

reveals.information: Rebuilt himself as a cyborg after the Sea Train destroyed his body when he tried to stop Tom from being taken away
Received the Pluton blueprints from Iceburg four years ago and was told to stop using the name Cutty Flam

keyMoments.title: Reveals CP9 Members to Fellow Carpenters
keyMoments.description: Paulie tells Tilestone and Lulu that Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno are the ones who tried to assassinate Iceburg, shocking his fellow Galley-La foremen.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation solidifies the Galley-La Company's motivation to join the rescue mission and shows how deeply CP9's infiltration has affected them.
keyMoments.quote: The ones who tried to kill Iceburg... they were Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno!

keyMoments.title: Agrees to Alliance
keyMoments.description: Paulie agrees to Luffy's proposal to form an alliance between the Straw Hats, Franky Family, and Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the Galley-La Company's commitment to the rescue mission and their willingness to work with former enemies.

keyMoments.title: Discovered as Stowaway on Rocketman
keyMoments.description: Chimney and her pet rabbit Gonbe are discovered on the front of the Rocketman, having stowed away to join the rescue mission.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chimney's determination to be part of the adventure and sets up her presence during the Enies Lobby arc.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Luffy from Falling
keyMoments.description: Chimney and Gonbe are thrown off the Rocketman by its acceleration but are caught by Luffy's stretching arms.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the danger of the journey and Luffy's protective nature.

keyMoments.title: Agrees to Alliance on Behalf of Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Zambai agrees to Luffy's proposal to form an alliance, representing the Franky Family's commitment to rescue their boss Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Solidifies the Franky Family's participation in the Enies Lobby rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Shocked by CP9 Revelation
keyMoments.description: Tilestone is shocked to learn that his trusted coworkers Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno were the ones who tried to assassinate Iceburg, having believed it was Michael and Hoichael.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional impact of CP9's betrayal on the Galley-La workers.
keyMoments.quote: What?! But we thought it was Michael and Hoichael!

keyMoments.title: Shocked by CP9 Revelation
keyMoments.description: Lulu is shocked alongside Tilestone to learn the truth about who tried to assassinate Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the betrayal felt by the Galley-La workers.
